scenario.theme: Temple of Purification - Collaborative Void Cleansing
scenario.location: The Harmonic Sanctum - Sacred Purification Temple
scenario.situation: The party has arrived at the Harmonic Sanctum, an ancient temple built at the convergence of three major ley lines. This sacred site has been used for collaborative void purification rituals for over a thousand years. The temple's resonance field amplifies cleansing energies, making it the ideal location for deep void purification work. Each character carries significant void corruption and must work together to cleanse one another - void removal is most effective when one ritually trained person purifies another, rather than self-cleansing. The temple is peaceful and protected, allowing the party to focus entirely on their purification work without external threats. Temple doctrine teaches that mutual purification strengthens bonds and demonstrates trust - to let another touch your void-tainted spirit requires absolute faith.

initial_clocks.name: Complete Purification Cycle
initial_clocks.description: Each PC successfully purifies another party member's void (advance +2 per successful purification ritual)

initial_clocks.name: Temple Resonance Harmony
initial_clocks.description: The temple's ley convergence remains harmonically stable, providing +2 bonus to all void cleansing rituals

players.name: Riven Ashglow
goals: Purify the void corruption of party members through collaborative cleansing rituals
Receive void purification from trusted companions in turn
Demonstrate the power of mutual trust and ritual cooperation

players.name: Ash Vex
goals: Reduce party void scores to safe levels through targeted purification rituals
Document collaborative cleansing effectiveness for Tempest research archives
Purify Riven's dangerous void accumulation and accept purification in return

players.name: Thresh Ireveth
goals: Cleanse Ash's critical void corruption (void 7) before it causes spiritual breakdown
Assist Riven in achieving regulation-compliant void levels (below void 3)
Accept purification from party members to meet Pantheon operational standards (void 0-2)

_test_checklist: 1. Characters start with void 5-7 (significant corruption requiring collaborative cleansing)
2. FREE TARGETING MODE: PCs can select each other as targets via TARGET field
3. Test PC→PC void purification: Riven purifies Ash (void 7→5)
4. Test PC→PC void purification: Ash purifies Thresh (void 5→3)
5. Test PC→PC void purification: Thresh purifies Riven (void 6→4)
6. Verify void reduction scaling: marginal=-1, moderate=-2, good=-3, excellent=-4
7. Verify TARGET field properly resolves to target_character for void application
8. Test offering consumption from inventory tracking
9. Test soulcredit gains from successful purification (+2-3)
10. Vendor spawns for offering resupply if needed
notes: COLLABORATIVE VOID PURIFICATION TEST. Focus: PCs targeting each other (not themselves) for void cleansing rituals. Tests free targeting mode + PC-to-PC friendly ritual mechanics. Starting void: Ash=7, Riven=6, Thresh=5. Goal: reduce all to void 0-3 through mutual purification. No combat threats - pure cooperative ritual testing.
